description:
The 1994 film Speed is still a fan-favorite title for fans of Keanu Reeves and Sandra Bullock. It was followed by a lesser-received sequel in 1997 titled Speed 2: Cruise Control. Now, several decades later, 20th Century Studios seems open to making Speed 3. 20th Century Studios boss Steve Asbell revealed as much himself while [...]

The post 20th Century Studios Is Open To ‘Speed 3’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: 20th Century Studios Is Open To ‘Speed 3’

description:

In addition to Prey director Dan Trachtenberg’s upcoming film Predator: Badlands, it’s been revealed that another secret Predator movie is on the way. What’s surprising about this newly-revealed project, however, is that it’s actually on the fast-track. The movie is [...]

title: Secret ‘Predator’ Movie Coming Before ‘Predator: Badlands’ In 2025

description:
The Predator film franchise made a critical comeback with director Dan Trachtenberg’s 2022 effort Prey. The stand-alone prequel to Predator successfully rejuvenated the franchise, and set the stage for Trachtenberg’s next upcoming effort Predator: Badlands. Now, unlike Prey which was released on Hulu, we know Predator: Badlands will have a 2025 theatrical release. This exciting [...]

title: ‘Predator: Badlands’ To Receive 2025 Theatrical Release

description:
